Summary: watched it float across the complex until it was out of sight
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object was like a clear orb with and orange glow from within it. about the size of a beach ball. It happened at dusk. It floated above the trees in a straight path going north east. It never rose or fell. Little to no wind. it didn't sway or bob around like a balloon. just moved in a straight line until it was out of site. watched in for about 2 to 5 minutes.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in West Bloomfield Township
There were no other sightings in West Bloomfield Township on or around July 27th 2011
